name: " Dot ", cool, witty Fine art Print.
description:
Dot is a witty fine art pigment print suitable for cool funky interiors. 
The print measures 40cm x 50cm 
Printed onto heavy German etching paper using archival inks.
This print is limited to 50 signed and numbered prints in this size.
The print is sold unframed. 
The print fits a standard 40cm x 50cm frame available on the high street. 
The image size includes a white border, 5cm at the top and bottom and 6cm either side of the image.
The UK postage is just £1.00. 
Any overseas buyers please contact me for postage price. 
The print is sent in a cardboard tube.
For more images,info, discounts and promotions please email me or visit my Facebook page.......
http://www.facebook.com/GavinHemporium     
or view more photo's at...... http://www.flickr.com/photos/gavinhemporium/                              or my blog
http://theeloquenceofwantoncuriosity.blogspot.com/
Thank you for looking, gavin.

name: Elegant decay, Statue 1 .... Fine art print
description:
Statue 1 is the first print from the series elegant decay. 
The print is taken from an original pencil drawing by Gavin Harrison. This print is a 40cm x 50cm l
Its a imited edition fine art pigment print. 
The image is printed onto heavy German etching paper using archival inks. 
This print is limited to 50 signed and numbered prints in this size. 
The print is sold unframed. 
It fits a standard 40cm x 50cm frame available on the high street. 
The image size includes a white border, 4 cm at the top and bottom of the print and a wider border at the sides.
More statue prints from the Elegant decay series will be added soon.
The UK postage is only £1. 
Any overseas buyers please contact me for postage price. 
The print is posted in a strong cardboard tube. 
The photos are small on the bigcartel the bright colours and details of Statue 1 are not really clear so If you need more images please email me or visit my blog.... 
http://theeloquenceofwantoncuriosity.blogspot.com/  
view more photos at ..... http://www.flickr.com/photos/gavinhemporium/
Im always very happy to discuss my work with people so please feel free to contact me.
Many thanks for looking at my work. 
Best wishes, Gavin.

name: Thinking man/men. Giclee limited edition fine art print
description:
The print 'Thinking man/men' is taken from an original Montage by Gavin Harrison. Old 1940's & 50's images were used to create the original art piece. 
Thinking man/men... is a 40cm x 50cm limited edition fine art pigment print. 
The image is printed onto heavy German etching paper using archival inks.
This print is limited to 50 signed and numbered prints in this size.
The print is sold unframed. But it fits a standard 40cm x 50cm frame available on the high street. The image size includes a white border, 
The UK postage is only £1. 
Any overseas buyers please contact me for postage price.

Please contact me or visit my blog for larger photos.

name: 2nd vintage mounted magazine cover Para Ti
description:
Hi, 
this is another vintage Spanish magazine cover. The magazine is called Para Ti and I imagine it dates from the 1940s. The magazine cover measures 11 1/2 inch x 8 1/2 inch ( 29 cm X 22 cm ) 
As the cover is delicate i'm selling it in a professionally cut white mount. The mount's size is 16 x 20 (405 mm X 505 mm ) which means the mounted cover fits most standard frames available from good high street stores. Because of the age of this cover please see photos for condition which I'd describe as delicate/worn. For more photos please see ........... http://theeloquenceofwantoncuriosity.blogspot.com/ or email me for more. Thanks for looking.

name: Man in the Hat, blank 5 x 7 Fine art Card by Gavin Harrison
description:
Hi there, looking for a cool greetings card ?
Man in the hat, is a new blank fine art greetings card by Gavin Harrison.
The image on the front is produced by Gavin Harrison photography.
The inside is left blank for your greetings and messages.
The card is 5 x 7 inches 
The card can also easily be framed in a standard 5 x 7 frame.
The card is printed onto 300 gsm matt card. It comes in a sealed poly bag with matching envelope.
The card is £2.00. UK postage only 10p. 
Overseas buyers please contact me for price.
To get more info,discounts and promotions please check out my blog & facebook page.......
http://theeloquenceofwantoncuriosity.blogspot.com/
https://www.facebook.com/GavinHemporium you can also view more photos at .... http://www.flickr.com/photos/gavinhemporium/
Many thanks, gavin.

name: " Sweet " ( large print ) urban, fine art Print.
description:
Sweet (large ) .......
Taken from an original Montage by Gavin Harrison, which use's cute and sentimental images. But look closer and you will see the image is much darker and is more urban contemporary piece than it first appears.
Just right for the art lover who likes to return to a piece again & again and discover new things.

The images is a 50cm x 70cm limited edition fine art pigment print.  Its printed onto heavy German etching paper using archival inks.
This print is limited to 50 signed and numbered prints in this size.
But a smaller 40cm x 50cm size is also available.
The print is sold unframed. 
It fits a standard 50cm x 70cm frame available on the high street. 
The image size includes a white border,
5cm at the top and bottom and 6cm either side of the image.
The UK postage is only £1. 
Any overseas buyers please contact me for postage price. 
The print is posted in a cardboard tube.
Because the images are small on bigcartel the bright colours and details are lost so If you need more images please email me or visit my blog....
http://theeloquenceofwantoncuriosity.blogspot.com/ 
Sample strips of the print can also be requested.
for discounts and promotions please check out my Facebook page ......... 
you can view more photo's at ....... http://www.flickr.com/photos/gavinhemporium/
http://www.facebook.com/GavinHemporium
Thank you for looking at my work. Gavin

name: Half forgotten days. Original framed montage 63cm x 65cm
description:
Half forgotten days is an original montage created in 2011 by Gavin Harrison ( prints available at http://www.saatchionline.com/ )
This is another piece created around the theme of memory and how we try to make sense of our past by recalling from the fragments of our histories we can bring to mind.
It was created using vintage images from magazines and books. As well as using acrylic & emulsion paints.
The piece is being sold ready framed. It measures 63cm x 65cm ( the frame measures 2cm )
If you have any questions or require more images please email me Im friendly and easy to talk to so dont hesitate.
